channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The bull market is turning 3 years old this week. Here’s where stocks are likely headed next.

item.title: Novo Nordisk is paying up to $5.2 billion for a San Francisco biotech working on liver disease
item.description: Novo Nordisk, the Danish drugmaker behind Ozempic and other weight-loss drugs, said it’s paying up to $5.2 billion to buy Akero Therapeutics, a biotec...

item.title: Social Security’s COLA increase could jump to 2.8% next year. That still isn’t enough for people to get by.
item.description: The cost-of-living adjustment can’t keep up with the actual cost of living, as retirees’ costs climb.

item.title: Ferrari’s stock suffers its worst day ever after capital-markets day
item.description: Ferrari, the premium sports-car maker with an equally expensive valuation, saw its worst day ever after a capital-market day presentation.

item.title: I’m having brain surgery. Will my heirs or the creditors get my money if I die?
item.description: “I’m 47 and have a small amount of investments totaling about $45,000, and I also have the same amount in debt.”

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.
